title: Hour 1 - Setting the Record Straight on College Football Playoff Expansion
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Setting the Record Straight on College Football Playoff Expansion
description:
Dan reacts to a report indicating that the College Football Playoff could expand to 12 teams as early as 2023. Dan gives insight on the reports he has heard and explains how they may conflict with the most recent news. Dan examines what an expanded playoff field could mean for college football.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
